availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Pitman (Laurel County, Kentucky, farmer and circuit clerk)

body.p: Laurel County, Kentucky, farmer and circuit clerk. Kentucky native. Farmer in Laurel County in 1860. Presiding clerk of the Laurel Circuit Court in Laurel County c1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel, Not Stated, p. 71. Find A Grave, "John A. Pitman (September 13, 1840-August 10, 1868)," Memorial #7704314, https://www.findagrave.com//memorial/7704314/john-pitman (accessed June 18, 2017).
